title: US stock market surges as S&P 500, Nasdaq and Dow jump ahead of critical Fed inflation report — Wall Street braces for rate-cut signals
description: US stock market jumped Friday as investors awaited the Fed-favored PCE inflation report. The S&P 500 rose 0.3%, Nasdaq added 0.4%, and the Dow gained 0.2%. Traders now see an 87% chance of a Fed rate cut next week. Job cuts hit 71,000, but weekly claims fell …
content: US stock market climbed on Friday as investors focused on the upcoming Fed-favored PCE inflation report. The S&P 500 rose 0.3%, edging closer to a fresh record high after three days of modest gai… [+8310 chars]
